welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ladner, Canada - a charming city known for its picturesque views, friendly community, and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boundary Bay Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boundary Bay Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal where most international and domestic flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coal Harbour Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Coal Harbour Airport is primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Miners Bay Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Miners Bay Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Springbank Airport is a small, single-story building with basic amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orcas Island Airport offers a small waiting area and check-in counters for departing flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Orcas Island Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
